entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a technology company that grants stock-based compensation to employees and directors, issues new shares of common stock, and has an Employee Stock Purchase Plan (ESPP). The company has various stock plans including an Executive Incentive Plan.

entities.name: COMPENSATION COMMITTEE
entities.description: The Compensation Committee approves stock awards to executive officers and certain senior executives under the Executive Incentive Plan.

relationships.relationship_description: The Compensation Committee approves stock awards to executive officers and certain senior executives at Microsoft under the Executive Incentive Plan.
